review_title: 1,400 lumens for 2 hours, false and not true - reduces to lower lumen after 15 mins
reviews: Just got this in the mail 2 days ago. I was testing the 1,400 lumen stage on both of the lamps to see if it would last 2 hours as the website described. Didnt last 15 mins before the housing got too hot. I think there's a fail switch that if it gets too hot than it has to drop to the lower lumen setting. I'm not sure if this is like for all high lumen head light or if its because the battery is right next to the housing causing it to be too hot. Either way, be aware of the 2 hour setting at 1,400 - not true. Also did it with full battery and same thing. I'm really disappointed, also fenix said they made this particular brand in China. Not impressed! Item was returned due to false advertising. I tried looking at the manual that came with it, nothing in there says that the mechanism in the housing would reset after 15 mins if it gets too hot. I understand it gets hot in there but if your going to mention that you can hold 1,400 lumens at 2 hours than you need to make sure you can do that with the correct housing to handle the heat. False adv.

reviews:
I bought the nitecore hc65 1000 lumen light last year which I love but the 1000 spot on this one is a little brighter. The one thing I do miss is a red light for when I get in my stand. the nitecore has a red light and I will see how long this light will run constantly using the spot light and the flood light. After I use it for hunting in a few weeks I will update my review
update..i used it for 2 months every day to goto my treestand and I love it ..long lasting battery and never got really hot..just wished it had a red light but I have a nitecore lr30 I hang in my stand I turn on for a red light to put my cloths on and just set everything up I would defanantly recommend this light..its great
product_name: Fenix HM65R Dual Beam 1400 Lumen LED Headlamp, 2 X high Capacity Batteries with EdisonBright Battery Carry case Bundle

review_title: What Took Me So Long To Buy This
reviews:
This is my 3rd Fenix product. Quality & impressive lighting device. I bought the headlamp so i could better my two young German Shepards on the trail at night.

And being in Arizona, regardless of day or night, a trail hazard is going to be rattlesnakes. Week before ordering this new headlamp, i was hiking at night without one of my Fenix lights and me and my dogs walked over what appeared at first glance to be a stick. Turned back to look at it and soon realized we walked over a Desert Night Snake (slightly venomous). It wasn't aggressive and slithered off the trail and into the brush. Trying to prevent incidents like this from happening again with the purchase of this headlamp.

And yes, been out on the trail 2x already using it and love it. Battery doesnt feel heavy at all, adjustable straps and love having nothing in my hands other than a leash.
product_name: Fenix HM65R Dual Beam 1400 Lumen LED Headlamp, 2 X high Capacity Batteries with EdisonBright Battery Carry case Bundle

reviews: I purchased this headlamp for hunting. Season is not here yet though. I took it out after dark and it seems bright and easy to use. A few days later, I went to test it further and the smaller of the 2 lights is all that would come on. It blinked and was not bright. Off, then on again no change. I removed the battery and reinstalled it, still no change. I reported it to Fenix but did not hear back. That is why my rating is lower. I finally held both on/off switches down hoping to reset something. It worked and the light seems to be OK now. If Fenix FAQs said that could happen, and how to resolve it, I'd be fine. I don't want to be a mile into the woods without a light because my 'fix' didn't work.

reviews: Had the usps lose a battery, seller said they would replace it. Great working light, battery life is great, shuts off with one click. Very nice product and company to deal with, thank you
product_name: Fenix HM65R Dual Beam 1400 Lumen LED Headlamp, 2 X high Capacity Batteries with EdisonBright Battery Carry case Bundle

reviews: If you are looking for the brightest most light weight headlamp on the market. Look no further. This light is absolutely crazy bright. I use it in the woods at night consistantly as an outdoorsman and i wont leave without it. Brighter than the lights in my 4 wheeler. And it doesnt have the heavy battery pack to be in the way. Even on the low setting it seems brighter than most lights ive had! Best buy of the year!
product_name: Fenix HM65R Dual Beam 1400 Lumen LED Headlamp, 2 X high Capacity Batteries with EdisonBright Battery Carry case Bundle

review_title: I love the flood cranked all the way up!
reviews: Ignore certain flashlight nerd 1 star reviews. I spend 8 hours a day in attics. I am a structured cabling professional. This light does it all. It weighs less than any other 18650 headlamp I have owned. I am completely impressed. I will buy another to keep as a backup.
product_name: Fenix HM65R Dual Beam 1400 Lumen LED Headlamp, 2 X high Capacity Batteries with EdisonBright Battery Carry case Bundle

reviews: Stopped working after 3 months. Returned it to Edison Bright and still have no idea where it is. If you are thinking of buying Fenix, buy from Fenix and not from Edison Bright, who does not reply to emails and appears to have decided to just keep my broken headlamp and not replace it. I should have had a new one in the mail 2 months ago. I sent it back July 7th. Again, AVOID BUYING ANYTHING FROM EDISON BRIGHT! Amazon's WORST seller and the worst customer service imaginable!
product_name: Fenix HM65R Dual Beam 1400 Lumen LED Headlamp, 2 X high Capacity Batteries with EdisonBright Battery Carry case Bundle

reviews: Great light. Great quality. Batteries are knock offs though. Just buy everything from fenix website.
product_name: Fenix HM65R Dual Beam 1400 Lumen LED Headlamp, 2 X high Capacity Batteries with EdisonBright Battery Carry case Bundle

reviews: My job requires me to often work in basements, and sometimes at night. This is best headlamp I’ve ever had in 20 years of HVAC. Battery life is really good, I bought an extra battery so I never have any down time. The fit is comfortable, and is not heavy on my head even for hours at a time. If you need light for any reason, be it work or pleasure, this is the one! It’s not cheap, but you honestly get what you pay for. Do it!!!
product_name: Fenix HM65R Dual Beam 1400 Lumen LED Headlamp, 2 X high Capacity Batteries with EdisonBright Battery Carry case Bundle

reviews: I use this light on my hardhat at work. Battery lasts all day on the 3rd setting with a 3500mah battery. It is much lighter and less bulky than most other 18650 headlamps. The price for this with the 2 batteries is quite cheap considering the quality of both. Loved it so much I bought one for at home too!
product_name: Fenix HM65R Dual Beam 1400 Lumen LED Headlamp, 2 X high Capacity Batteries with EdisonBright Battery Carry case Bundle

review_title: Nice piece of kit with 2 exceptions.
reviews: Very nice machines aluminum/magnesium body. But the clip that hold the light to the strap is cheap plastic. And no way is this 1400 lumen. It’s bright, but not as bright as a 1000lumen Surefire X300u. Just don’t expect 1400 lumen.

review_title: No red light with this price point!?
reviews: Light seems good...HOWEVER....spending over $115 on a headlamp one would expect the light to come with a red light ability. Didn’t realize when purchased and this was a HUGE disappointment as I use this for night fishing and bugs tend to leave you alone when using red light. Bummer...light has so much potential.
